text: The 2015 Lebanese Elite Cup is the 18th edition of this football tournament in Lebanon. The competition started on 11 September through to the final on 27 September. This tournament includes the six best teams from the 2014–15 Lebanese Premier League season. == Group stage == === Group A === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=165|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !width=20|GD !width=20|Pts |- bgcolor = ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| Al Ahed | 2 || 1 || 1 || 0 || 3 || 1 || +2 ||4 |-bgcolor = ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| Safa | 2 || 0 || 2 || 0 || 4 || 4 || 0 ||2 |- |style="text-align:left;"| Al- Nejmeh | 2 || 0 || 1 || 1 || 3 || 5 || −2 ||1 |} === Group B === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=165|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !width=20|GD !width=20|Pts |- bgcolor = ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| Al Ansar | 2 || 1 || 1 || 0 || 5 || 4 || +1 ||4 |-bgcolor = ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| Nabi Sheet | 2 || 0 || 2 || 0 || 2 || 2 || 0 ||2 |- |style="text-align:left;"| Tripoli | 2 || 0 || 1 || 1 || 4 || 5 || −1 ||1 |} == Final stage == ===Semi finals=== \---- ===Final=== Category:Lebanese Elite Cup seasons Elite Elite
